com.orbischallenge.game.client.gameObjects

Class Combatant

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.orbischallenge.game.client.gameObjects.GameObjects
      • com.orbischallenge.game.client.gameObjects.DirectionalGameObjects
        • com.orbischallenge.game.client.gameObjects.Combatant
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Opponent, Player

    public abstract class Combatant
extends DirectionalGameObjects
    An abstract class that has methods shared by both you and your opponent.
    Author:
    OrbisAccess
